ProductInfo.Features:
Keyboard - Onscreen 12 key and QWERTY, 3.3-inch Plasma display with Mobile BRAVIA Engine, Touchscreen, Auto rotate
Network: GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900. UMTS/HSPA 900/2100. Platform: Android 2.3
Internal phone storage: Up to 300MB free. RAM: 512MB. Memory card slot: micros, up to 32GB (4GB card included)
Camera: 8.1 MP, Digital zoom - up to 16x, Aperture - f/2.4, Auto focus, Geo tagging, Front-facing camera (VGA), Red-eye reduction, Flash / light type, Video light, Video stabilizer, Smile detection, Face detection, Sony's Exmor R for mobile CMOS sensor
Synchronization - Exchange ActiveSync, Google Maps - with Street View, Wi-Fi, USB mass storage, 3.5 mm audio jack, DLNA Certified, Bluetooth technology, aGPS, Micro USB support
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson ST18i XPERIA Ray Unlocked Android Smartphone with 8MP Camera, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and GPS - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Black
